member.name: M:DicomStrictCompare.ProfileTools.DepthToPercentOfPeak(System.Collections.Generic.List{EvilDICOM.RT.DoseValue},System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the depth from surface that a PDD will drop below the percent provided. percent=50 would yield the depth at which the profile falls to below 0.5*Peak
member.param: PDD Profile data
Integer representing percent of depth of interest
member.returns: The index of the furthest voxel from the surface that has a dose value above the percent of interest
member.exception: Thrown when the profile does not drop below the sought percent
